data.Name: STRFKR
data.Bio: STRFKR - (Alternate name for Starfucker) Founded by Josh Hodges (2007) in Portland, OR. Band now includes: Keil Corcoran, Shawn Glassford, Patrick Morris. 3rd. LP: "Miracle Mile" out on Polyvinyl 2/19/13 http://www.polyvinylrecords.com/miraclemile Opening Track: "While I'm Alive" Out Now: https://soundcloud.com/polyvinyl-records/starfucker-while-im-alive Tour Dates 2013: http://strfkrmusic.com/tour "Happy Fucking Holidays" https://soundcloud.com/starfucker_usa/happy-fucking-holidays Read more on Last.fm
